edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron

Class Patron

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron.User
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron.Patron
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<User>

    public class Patron
extends User
    The patron class creates a patron using the base functionality of the User class.
    Author:
    Marcus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Patron(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String password, int maxCheckedOut)
      The patron constructor constructs a patron given an id and password.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeAccount()
      The close account method closes the user's account and returns all checked out books to the library.
      void moveAheadOneInReserves(int pos)
      The move ahead one in reserves method moves the book in the given position ahead one position in the reserve queue.
      void reserve(Book book)
      The reserve method places the book at the end of the reserve queue.
      void returnBook(int pos)
      The return book returns a book in the given position from the checked out list.
      java.lang.String traverseCheckedOut()
      The traverse checked out method return a string of the books in the checked out queue in the order in which they were reserved.
      java.lang.String traverseReserveQueue()
      The traverse reserve queue method returns a string of the books in the reserve queue in the order in which they were reserved.
      void unReserve(int pos)
      The unreserve method removes the book in the given position from the reserve queue.

      • Patron

        public Patron(java.lang.String id,
      java.lang.String password,
      int maxCheckedOut)
        The patron constructor constructs a patron given an id and password. It calls the parent constructor from the abstract parent class.
        Parameters:
        id - the patron's id
        password - the patron's password
        maxCheckedOut - the maximum number of books the patron can check out

    • Method Detail

      • traverseReserveQueue

        public java.lang.String traverseReserveQueue()
        The traverse reserve queue method returns a string of the books in the reserve queue in the order in which they were reserved.
        Returns:
        books the string of reserved books

      • traverseCheckedOut

        public java.lang.String traverseCheckedOut()
        The traverse checked out method return a string of the books in the checked out queue in the order in which they were reserved.
        Returns:
        books the string of checked out books

      • moveAheadOneInReserves

        public void moveAheadOneInReserves(int pos)
        The move ahead one in reserves method moves the book in the given position ahead one position in the reserve queue.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the book to advance ahead one position

      • unReserve

        public void unReserve(int pos)
        The unreserve method removes the book in the given position from the reserve queue.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the book to unreserve

      • reserve

        public void reserve(Book book)
        The reserve method places the book at the end of the reserve queue.
        Parameters:
        book - a book to add to the end of the reserve queue

      • closeAccount

        public void closeAccount()
        The close account method closes the user's account and returns all checked out books to the library.

      • returnBook

        public void returnBook(int pos)
        The return book returns a book in the given position from the checked out list. It returns the book to the library inventory.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position in the checked out list to return
